body: So for the past couple of days there has been a huge increase in block lag and lagging back. I really don't know what is going on, but this is happening to a couple a people. If this could please some how be fixed, do it!
body_tagged: So for the past couple of days there has been a huge increase in block lag and lagging back. I really don't know what is going on, but this is happening to a couple a people. If this could please some how be fixed, do it!
title: Lag Back / Block Lag

reply_to.body: TinyBear, as a noob I get that you think you run these forums. But I'll have you know I have a monopoly on anything running related and anything forum related. I run the topics here, I run these streets. And if you ever try and pull one of these again, know that I will be here, watching, like a hawk, and I will not miss. You're a kite, dancing in a hurricane. Next time you make a post here, know that I will be, to paraphrase Pie, "right behind him [you], looking over his [your] shoulder" when you post. Check yourself
